text: To create a Workflow Bridge profile configuration, click on the New Configuration button from Configuration View , and then select Workflow Bridge Profile from the selection screen. The content s of the buttons i n the bar may change depending on which configuration type has been opened in the currently displayed tab. Workflow bridge uses the standard menu items and buttons that are visible for all configurations, and these are described in Common Configuration Buttons . Setting Description External References To Enable External References in a Workflow Bridge profile. This can be used for configuring the Number of Collectors , Bulk Size, and Bulk Timeout . For further information, see External Reference Profile . The Workflow Bridge configuration contains two tabs: General and Advanced . This section has the following subsections: Workflow Bridge Profile Configuration General Tab Workflow Bridge Profile Configuration Advanced Tab
title: Workflow Bridge Profile Configuration - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
